annotations.description: The performance from both sides could be described as average. There were only a few stirring moments and the fans probably expected more from this game. It was an even match on the whole, with both sides enjoying spells in the ascendancy. The home team played possession football, while the away team tried to find the weakness in their defence using mainly rapid counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That's it for today, Gianpaolo Calvarese has blown his whistle and the game is over.
Giacomo Bonaventura (AC Milan) pounces on the rebound on the edge of the box but his wild shot goes high over the crossbar.
Keisuke Honda (AC Milan) puts a cross into the box from the free kick, but the defender gets there first.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: A yellow card for a tackle by Pablo Armero (Udinese). Gianpaolo Calvarese doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.
A cross is whipped into the box by Keisuke Honda (AC Milan) and Carlos Bacca controls it well. He lines up the ball, but one of the defenders produces a timely intervention.
Gianluca Lapadula (AC Milan) shows too much aggression during an attacking move and ends up fouling his opponent.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 8 additional min. will be played.

annotations.label: substitution

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Badu sends a precise lofted cross into the box. Stipe Perica (Udinese) latches on to it and finishes with a quick shot inside the right post. The goalkeeper had no chance. The score changes to 0:1.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Vincenzo Montella has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Gianluca Lapadula (AC Milan) replacing Andrea Poli.

Orestis Karnezis displays his ability to read the game and clears the danger after Keisuke Honda (AC Milan) threatened to latch onto a through ball from just outside the box.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Rodrigo De Paul (Udinese) launches an inaccurate corner kick into the penalty area.

Rodrigo De Paul (Udinese) sends over a cross, but he can't find any teammate inside the box. Poor delivery.
A free kick into the box, taken by Riccardo Montolivo (AC Milan), is comfortably cleared by the opposition's defence.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Rodrigo De Paul (Udinese) attempts to discuss the decision with Gianpaolo Calvarese, but he soon realises that it's not the right thing to do as he sees the yellow.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Gianpaolo Calvarese shows a yellow card to Stipe Perica (Udinese), who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late.

Orestis Karnezis doesn't have to worry about this one. Suso plays a pass into the feet of Carlos Bacca (AC Milan), who is unable to find the target as his effort from inside the box goes well wide of the right post.

Carlos Bacca (AC Milan) attempts to score as he rises near the penalty spot and heads the ball to the roof of the net. Orestis Karnezis displays brilliant reflexes and pulls off a comfortable save to stop the ball from hitting the net.
Suso (AC Milan) attempts to find the head of one of his teammates with a promising cross into the box, but a defender outjumps the attackers and averts the threat.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: A horde of players are waiting inside the penalty area for a cross from the corner, but Suso (AC Milan) takes it short.

annotations.description: Gianpaolo Calvarese shows a yellow card to Badu (Udinese) for a tough tackle.

annotations.description: Corner kick. Rodrigo De Paul (Udinese) is ready to send the ball into the box.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Everything is set for the start of the second half.

Not the best game in the world so far but certainly not the worst either. Chances have been few. No side has really dominated in this first half. The home side attempts to hold onto the ball for as long as possible, while the away team's main weapon is fast counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The match has reached half time.

annotations.description: Suso (AC Milan) decides to speed play up with a short corner kick.

The performance from both sides could be described as average. There were only a few stirring moments and the fans probably expected more from this game. It was an even match on the whole, with both sides enjoying spells in the ascendancy. The home team played possession football, while the away team tried to find the weakness in their defence using mainly rapid counter attacks.
